title: mAmava sarasvati
sahitya:
mAmava sarasvati (amba) vara tAmarasAna yuvati


anupallavi

  sOma vadanE sarasija sadanE kuvalayadaLa nayanE
kAmitArtha dAyini suvadanE shAradAbhra shubra varNa vasanE


caraNam    vANI puravatsalEpita kara pustaka pANi enAnta dhAriNi tamO hAriNi
				(madhyamakAla)
mArgahindOLa rAgAnurasya rAga rakta bimbAdhara yuktE
sadAshiva krta gIta shakta sadA jnAna pradAyaka hastE
